section.title: dbm Key-Value 数据库
section.programlisting:
import dbm
with dbm.open(file="/tmp/cache", flag="c") as db: print(db.keys()) print("=" * 20) if "hello".encode() in db.keys(): print(f"找到: { db['hello']}") else: print(f"没找到") db["hello"] = "world"

section.title: HTTP 2
section.programlisting:
import httpx client = httpx.Client(http2=True, verify=False) headers = { 'Host': 'netkiller.com', 'upgrade-insecure-requests': '1', 'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.121 Safari/537.36', 'accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9', 'sec-fetch-site': 'none', 'sec-fetch-mode': 'navigate', 'sec-fetch-dest': 'document', 'accept-language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.9' }
response = client.get('https://www.netkiller.cn/linux/', headers=headers) print(response.text)

section.title: 异步请求
section.programlisting: async with httpx.AsyncClient() as client: resp = await client.get('https://www.netkiller.cn/index.html') assert resp.status_code == 200 html = resp.text

import httpx import asyncio
async def main(): async with httpx.AsyncClient() as client: resp = await client.get("https://www.netkiller.cn") result = resp.text print(result)
asyncio.run(main())
